Verses: 1 en Aaththumaa Jeevanai Arosikkiradhu, Naan En Thuyaraththukku Enakkulle Idankoduththu, En Manasanjalaththinaale Pesuven.
2 naan Dhevanai Nokki: Ennaik Kutravaaliyendru Theerkkaadhirum; Neer Edhinimiththam Ennode Vazhakkaadugireer, Adhai Enakkuth Theriyappaduththum Enben.
3 neer Ennai Odukki, Ummudaiya Kaigalin Kiriyaiyai Veruththu, Dhunmaarkkarin Yosanaiyaik Kirubaiyaaip Paarkkiradhu Umakku Nandraayirukkumo?
4 maamsak Kangal Umakku Undo? Manushan Paarkkirapragaaramaaip Paarkkireero?
5 neer En Akkiramaththaik Kindikkilappi, En Paavaththai Aaraaindhu Visaarikkiradharku,
6 ummudaiya Naatkal Oru Manushanudaiya Naatkalaippolavum, Ummudaiya Varushangal Oru Purushanudaiya Jeevakaalaththaippolavum Irukkiradho?
7 naan Dhunmaarkkan Alla Enbadhu Umakkuth Theriyum; Ummudaiya Kaikku Ennaith Thappuvikkiravan Illai.
8 ummudaiya Karangal Ennaiyum Enakkuriya Ellaavatraiyum Uruvaakkip Padaiththirundhum, Ennai Nirmoolamaakkugireer.
9 kalimanpola Ennai Uruvaakkineer Enbadhaiyum, Ennaith Thirumbath Thoolaagappogappannuveer Enbadhaiyum Ninaiththarulum.
10 neer Ennaip Paalpol Vaarththu, Thayirpol Uraiyappannineer Allavo?
11 tholaiyum Sadhaiyaiyum Enakkuth Thariththu, Elumbugalaalum Narambugalaalum Ennai Isaiththeer.
12 enakku Jeevanaith Thandhadhum Allaamal, Dhayavaiyum Enakkup Paaraattineer; Ummudaiya Paraamarippu En Aaviyaik Kaappaatrinadhu.
13 ivaigal Ummudaiya Ullaththil Maraindhirundhaalum, Idhu Umakkul Irukkiradhu Endru Ariven.
14 naan Paavancheydhaal, Adhai Neer Ennidaththil Visaariththu, En Akkiramaththai Enmel Sumaththaamal Videer.
15 naan Dhunmaarkkanaayirundhaal Enakku Aiyo! Naan Needhimaanaayirundhaalum En Thalaiyai Naan Edukkamaatten; Avamaanaththaal Nirappappatten; Neer En Sirumaiyaip Paarththarulum, Adhu Adhigarikkiradhu.
16 singaththaippola Ennai Vettaiyaadi, Enakku Virodhamaai Umadhu Adhisaya Vallamaiyai Vilangappannugireer.
17 neer Ummudaiya Saatchigalai Enakku Virodhamaai Rattikkappannugireer; Enmel Ummudaiya Kobaththai Adhigarikkappannugireer; Poraattaththinmel Poraattam Adhigarikkiradhu.
18 neer Ennaik Karppaththilirundhu Purappadappanninadhu Enna? Oru Kannum Ennaik Kaanaadhapadi, Naan Appozhudhe Jeeviththupponaal Nalamaame.
19 naan Orukkaalum Illaadhadhupolirundhu, Karppaththilirundhu Predhakkuzhikkuk Kondupogappattiruppen.
20 en Naatkal Konjamallavo?

21 kaarirulum Marana Andhagaaramulla Irunda Dhesamum, Irul Soozhndha Ozhungillaadha Marana Andhagaaramulla Irunda Dhesamum, Oliyum Irulaagum Dhesamumaagiya, Ponaal Thirumbivaraadha Dhesaththukku Naan Pogumunne,
22 naan Satru Ilaippaarumpadi Neer Ennaivittu Oindhirum Endraan.
